snippet: Shirley Ann Jackson of Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute earned $7,143,312 in 2012, according to the Chronicle of Higher Education’s ranking of salaries at private colleges.
abstract: Chronicle of Higher Education annual pay survey shows Shirley Ann Jackson, president of Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, was nation's highest-paid president of a private college in 2012 with total compensation of $7,143,312.
lead_paragraph: Shirley Ann Jackson of Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute earned $7,143,312 in 2012, according to the Chronicle of Higher Education’s ranking of salaries at private colleges.

headline.main: Rensselaer President Leads List of Highest-Paid Private College Leaders
headline.print_headline: Rensselaer President Leads List of Highest Paid
